topic.title: Memo to based RACISTS
topic.body: Remember Biden is white so don't blame any of the hell he's about to unleash on black people. BTW nobody voted for his ass either. This is a white issue, oh and your Q shit was stupid too. And to hell with all your media based race baiting, that's y'all too. So basically the white people in power are responsible for ending humanity. Base that

1610999130_1J46C7eJx1gagCBw898jtb8n3RCWp.body: Blame things on the black man, go head Obama me. Because my bitch is badder than the economy.
